channel.title: [TUT] Loading new rs data files in #317
channel.description:
This is for files stored in %SystemRoot$/.file_store_32 (main file caches) Open Class9.java then search for [code]if(class9.anInt217 == 1 || class9.anInt217 == 4 || class9.anInt217 == 5 || class9.anInt217 == 6)[/code] before it add [code] if(class9.anInt262 == 8) class9.aString248 = class30_sub2_sub2.readString();[/code] This is nothing special, you just won't get interface loading error TODO: 1. Fix when "Loading - please wait..." apears client stops and shows
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
2. See your self: [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/2845/untitled6zk1.jpg[/img]

item.title: [TUT] Loading new rs data files in #317
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

bentski, it appears you are using a somewhat more renamed deob than I have, what you call:

class30_sub2_sub2.readString();

unrenamed is called:

class30_sub2_sub2.method415();

in addition:

how did you get to log in, I always get the java out of memory error?

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Loading new rs data files in #317
item.dc:creator: @bentski bentski
item.description:
@bentski wrote:

This is for files stored in %SystemRoot$/.file_store_32 (main file caches)

Open Class9.java then search for

if(class9.anInt217 == 1 || class9.anInt217 == 4 || class9.anInt217 == 5 || class9.anInt217 == 6)

before it add

if(class9.anInt262 == 8) class9.aString248 = class30_sub2_sub2.readString();
This is nothing special, you just won’t get interface loading error

TODO:

  1. Fix when “Loading - please wait…” apears client stops and shows
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
2. See your self: [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/2845/untitled6zk1.jpg[/img]

Read full topic
